TOPIC.HEAD: Some additional information for the Help-tool
TOPIC.TEXT: Every 2 seconds, the file "topic.dat" is accessed. If the timestamp changed, the topic in that file is displayed. This will be improved.
It assumes there is a file "./help.xml" or ".\HELP.XML". This will be improved as well.

Problems with help-tool on Unix:
No underlined text.
Crappy wrapping of lines.
No possibility of displaying pictures.
No possiblity to change the mouse cursor when going over a link.
Font name and size do not work.
No key-event in Textfields.
Italics not available on standard font.
Dialog boxes are not modal
Timer not implemented.

Problems with help-tool on Windows:
No underlined text.
No wrapping of lines.
No possibility of displaying pictures.
No possiblity to change the mouse cursor when going over a link.

This not even everything that does not work yet. When Vision2 is finished a lot will be fixed. Please start using this help-tool, create documents and see if you can find bugs. Also, suggestions to improve the help-tool are more than welcome.
